articles.headline: Mickey’s Copyright Adventure: Early Disney Creation Will Soon Be Public Property
articles.snippet: The version of the iconic character from “Steamboat Willie” will enter the public domain in 2024. But those trying to take advantage could end up in a legal mousetrap.
articles.abstract: The version of the iconic character from “Steamboat Willie” will enter the public domain in 2024. But those trying to take advantage could end up in a legal mousetrap.
articles.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — There is nothing soft and cuddly about the way Disney protects the characters it brings to life.

articles.headline: Migrant Expulsion Policy Must Stay in Place for Now, Supreme Court Says
articles.snippet: The temporary stay in lifting the pandemic rule known as Title 42 is a provisional victory for 19 states, led mostly by Republicans, that had sought to keep it in place on the border.
articles.abstract: The temporary stay in lifting the pandemic rule known as Title 42 is a provisional victory for 19 states, led mostly by Republicans, that had sought to keep it in place on the border.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Supreme Court said on Tuesday that a pandemic-era health measure that restricted migration at the southern border would remain in place for the time being, delaying the potential for a huge increase in unlawful crossings.
articles.byline: By Adam Liptak, Miriam Jordan and Eileen Sullivan

articles.headline: Race for G.O.P. Chair Obscures the Party’s Bigger Problems
articles.snippet: Ronna McDaniel’s quest for a fourth term atop the Republican National Committee has triggered an ugly intraparty fight between the right and the farther right. Figuring out how to win back swing voters is not a top priority.
articles.abstract: Ronna McDaniel’s quest for a fourth term atop the Republican National Committee has triggered an ugly intraparty fight between the right and the farther right. Figuring out how to win back swing voters is not a top priority.
articles.lead_paragraph: Since former President Donald J. Trump’s narrow victory in 2016, the Republican Party has suffered at the ballot box every two years, from the loss of the House in 2018 to the loss of the White House and Senate in 2020 to this year’s history-defying midterm disappointments.
articles.byline: By Jonathan Weisman and Ken Bensinger

articles.headline: U.S. Scrambles to Stop Iran From Providing Drones for Russia
articles.snippet: As the war in Ukraine grinds on, some officials have become convinced that Iran and Russia are building a new alliance of convenience.
articles.abstract: As the war in Ukraine grinds on, some officials have become convinced that Iran and Russia are building a new alliance of convenience.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Biden administration has embarked on a broad effort to halt Iran’s ability to produce and deliver drones to Russia for use in the war in Ukraine, an endeavor that has echoes of its yearslong program to cut off Tehran’s access to nuclear technology.
articles.byline: By David E. Sanger, Julian E. Barnes and Eric Schmitt
